description: Meat-free mince and mushrooms make a great beef substitute in this rich and cheesy vegetarian lasagna.
name: One Pan Veggie Mince Lasagna Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180Â°C. Heat the oil in a large pan and cook the onion for 5 minutes, add the mushrooms and cook for 5 minutes. Stir in the garlic, oregano and veggie mince and cook for 2 minutes.
Crumble in the stock cube, pour over the chopped tomatoes and a tin of water, bring to the boil, reduce the heat and simmer for 15 minutes until reduced.
Melt the butter in a saucepan, whisk in the flour and cook for 1 minute. Whisk in the milk and cook, stirring until thickened. Add the grated cheese and cook for 1 minute to melt.
Spoon half of the mince mixture into a large baking dish, top with lasagne sheets and repeat. Pour over the cheese sauce and bake for 25 minutes until golden and bubbling.
